root.src.model.sa package

Submodules

root.src.model.sa.sa_predict module

root.src.model.sa.sa_predict.SA_MODEL_PREDICT(SA_PROCESSED_DF_SVM, SA_PROCESSED_DF_FLAIR, mode)[source]

inputs : DataFrames with processed data for SVM and Flair respectively, mode = train|predict output : DataFrame with final class predictions and probability of predictions function: ensemble the results of two best performance models and give the predictions

root.src.model.sa.sa_predict.flair_predict(test_data_flair)[source]

input : processed test_data DataFrame for flair model output : results of flair model function : use flair model to predict the sentiment results

root.src.model.sa.sa_predict.main(file_path)[source]
root.src.model.sa.sa_predict.scoring(test_df)[source]

inputs : DataFrame with ‘Time’ and ‘Text’ output : dataframe[“Text”, Time”, “predicted_sentiment_probability”, “predicted_sentiment”] function: Apply preprocessing and fit final model to output final_sentiment and predicted sentiment_probability

root.src.model.sa.sa_predict.svm_predict(test_data_svm, mode)[source]

input : processed test_data DataFrame for SVM model output : results of SVM model function : use SVM model to predict the sentiment results

root.src.model.sa.sa_train module

root.src.model.sa.sa_train.bayes_classifier(train_data, test_data)[source]

input : 2 DataFrames ‘train_data’ and ‘test_data’ output : None function : Fits Naive Baye’s Classifier on the train_data. Evaluates performance on test_data

root.src.model.sa.sa_train.evaluate_model_test(true_sent, predicted_sent, predicted_prob)[source]

input : List of true sentiment label, predicted sentiment label, predicted_probability output : Print classification_report, scores and confusion matrix, pr_auc curve function : Prints classification_report and evaluation metrics on test data

root.src.model.sa.sa_train.final_svm_full_model(train_data)[source]

input : full preprocessed train data output : final svm model function : Refit svm model on comeplete training data and save the final model for future unseen predictions

root.src.model.sa.sa_train.logistic_regression(train_data, test_data)[source]

input : 2 DataFrames ‘train_data’ and ‘test_data’ output : None function : Fits Logistic Regression Model on the train_data. Evaluates performance on test_data

root.src.model.sa.sa_train.sa_train_test_split(reviews_csv)[source]

input : processed reviews_csv DataFrame output : 2 DataFrames - train_data (70%), test_data(30%) function : Splits input data into train and test

root.src.model.sa.sa_train.svc_model(train_data, test_data)[source]

input : 2 DataFrames ‘train_data’ and ‘test_data’ output : None function : Fits Support Vector Machine (SVM) Classifier on the train_data and saves model.

Evaluates performance on test_data

root.src.model.sa.sa_train.train_XGB(train_data, test_data)[source]

input : 2 DataFrames ‘train_data’ and ‘test_data’ output : None function : Fits XGBoost Classifier on the train_data, and saves model. Evaluate performance on test_data

root.src.model.sa.sa_train.vader(train_data, test_data)[source]

input : 2 DataFrames ‘train_data’ and ‘test_data’ output : None function : Evaluates performance of pretrained Vader Model on the train_data and test_data
